name: Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc.
description: Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. is a leading real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on the hospitality sector. Founded in 1993 and headquartered in Bethesda, Maryland, the company owns an extensive portfolio of upscale and luxury hotels, primarily located in prime urban and resort destinations across the United States and internationally. Host Hotels operates under well-known brands, including Marriott, Hilton, and Hyatt, offering a range of accommodations from high-end luxury suites to business-friendly hotels. The company's strategy emphasizes maximizing revenue and asset value through strategic acquisitions and active asset management. With a commitment to sustainability and responsible investing, Host Hotels is dedicated to reducing its carbon footprint and enhancing the guest experience. The company is well-positioned to benefit from the recovery of the travel and tourism industry, leveraging its diverse portfolio and strong relationships with leading hotel brands. Host Hotels is focused on delivering long-term value to its shareholders while maintaining high standards of corporate governance and transparency in its operations.
